name: Tomb of Akhenaten
description: Pharaoh Akhenaten had attempted to convert all his subjects to worship one God, Aten but this didn't go down well with many people. When he died and was buried in his tomb, all knowledge of the Pharaoh and the location of his tomb was wiped from all records but you have discovered it all. In this top view single screen maze game you must move around the maze looking for the tomb while collecting as much treasure as you can. As you move your strength decrease but you can increase it when food appears. As you explore treasure appears as well as many creatures which need avoiding. Once your strength is on zero then it is game over.

shot.caption: Food and a nasty on screen
